text:
When making a custom 
org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.JUnitResultFormatter, I noticed 
that the 
org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.JUnitVersionHelper.getTestCaseClassName 
method is package-visible, while the getTestCaseName method is public. I see 
no reason why getTestCaseClassName utility method should not be public.
creator: gijs.peek@gmail.com

text:
Seems a reasonable change. 

Fixed in SVN_HEAD.
creator: stevel@apache.org
